Remember, Derek Carr is not listening to the critics . . . here's his observation of Drew Brees: `He'd rather rather throw a completion than a 40-yard pass for an incompletion. He has a Super Bowl ring, so he doesn't hear much about it.' #Raiders
I’ve titled Derek Carr’s #Raiders presser as:   “I hear you talking 💩, but I’m going to do my thing.”

Derek Carr on facing Saints Mon.: “I am excited for the chance to play a great team and see where we’re at.” Just like in 2016, #Raiders going in very confident.  He sees parallels to that playoff team.

Derek Carr's answer about Drew Brees' play:  "He would rather throw a completion than throw a 40-yard pass for an incompletion. And he has a Super Bowl ring, so he doesn't hear much about it. (Smiling) I love his game. He keeps the ball moving. He's efficient..."  #Raiders
